title: Algorithmic Monetary Policies for Blockchain Participation Games
summary: A central challenge in blockchain tokenomics is aligning short-term performance incentives with long-term decentralization goals. We propose a framework for algorithmic monetary policies that navigates this tradeoff in repeated participation games.
